title: Link to /ALL Chat LCS Party doesn't work
body:
Just takes me to Youtube.com.

R.I.P My entertainment for the day.

This is unacceptable Riot.

I will be sending my complaint directly to the head of your department.

Be aware.

replies.body:
There was a problem with the way it was uploaded :( Sorry about that. Should be fixed now.

You can see it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pl6XTCjmA98&feature=youtu.be
